name: Design bitcoin for everyone
description:
Slides for our talk at Figma Config on April 21. Here's our talk summary:


Christoph and Johns are among many contributors to the Bitcoin Design Guide which aims to help both designers and developers create better Bitcoin experiences faster. The community also work to promote the idea of open design, to bring more designers into the space, and to help open-source projects adopt better design processes.
